p: One example of incorporation of rosemary into meat was reported in 2013 by Sirocchi et al. [ 49]. These authors incorporated Rosmarinus officinalis EO at 4 ( w/ w) in active packaging of meat. This EO inhibited the increase of putrefaction products, such as cadaverine and the development of bacteria, such as Enterobacteriaceae and Brochothrix thermosphacta.
